name: 2.4. Event Phase
content:
In the Event phase, a random event may affect your kingdom as a whole or a single settlement or hex.

There is a small chance of an event occurring. If no event occurred during the last turn, this chance increases significantly.

Some events can be negated, ended, or compensated for with some kind of kingdom check. Others, such as a rampaging monster, require you to complete an adventure or deal with a problem in a way not covered by the kingdom-building rules.
